unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Finding the Mean from a Probability Distribution Table: Hat Day
question_text:
The number of hats a vendor sells before baseball game has the following probability distribution:
Number of hats (X) 0 1 2 3 4 5
P(x) 0.05 0.10 0.15 0.28 0.24 0.18


If each hat sells for $\$20$, what is the expected total dollar amount a vendor will make for selling hats before a baseball game?
